Name: Ordinary Jewelry
Effect Text:
Fanfare: Gain 0-10 cookies.
Sell: Gain 5 cookies.
Flavor Text: A random piece of jewelry [Player] stole from their mother's cabinet. [Player] didn't know what it was, and they don't care.

Name: Blackmail
Effect Text:
Activate: Select a player and an item they revealed.
Fanfare: The selected item is sent to the discard pile.
Action: The selected player loses 0-10 cookies.

Name: Scandal Tabloid
Effect Text:
Activate: Select a player and a bot.
Fanfare: If the selected bot is backing the selected player, cancel that backing.
Action: The selected player loses 0-1 favor with each bot.
Flavor Text: It doesn't matter if it's a lie as long as you get what you want.

Name: [Player]'s poop
Effect Text: Sell: Lose 10 cookies.
Flavor Text: Hey, [Player] needed to fill their deck somehow.

Name: Diamond
Effect Text:
Activate: Select a bot.
Fanfare: Gain 2 favor with the selected bot.
Sell: Gain 50 cookies.

Name: Slave
Effect Text:
Acquire: Gain 1 favor with Del. Lose 1 favor with all other bots.
Action: Gain 15 cookies.
Sell: Gain 10 cookies.

Name: Caged Bird
Effect Text:
Activate: Select a Bot.
Fanfare: Gain 2 favor with the selected bot.
Sell: Gain 20 cookies.

Name: Mercenary
Effect Text:
Acquire: Gain 1 favor with Del. Lose 1 favor with Nabla.
Action: Gain 30 cookies.
Sell: Gain 20 cookies.

Name: Venomous Serpent
Effect Text:
Activate: Select a bot.
Fanfare: Gain 4 favor with the selected bot and lose 1 favor with a random bot.
Sell: Gain 40 cookies.

Name: Spy
Effect Text:
Activate: Select a player.
Fanfare: Silent. Steal 50 cookies from the selected player.
Action: Silent. Discard this item.
Sell: Gain 40 cookies.

Name: Tiger
Effect Text:
Activate: Select a player.
Fanfare: Gain 5 favor with the selected bot.
Sell: Gain 60 cookies.

Name: Phantom Thief
Effect Text:
Fanfare: Silent. Steal 50 cookies from each player. Mill 1.
Presence: If selected as a target for "Select a player", 25% chance to discard this item.
Sell: Gain 80 cookies.

Name: Phoenix
Effect Text:
Action: Put a "Phoenix Feather" in your discard pile.
Sell: Gain 200 cookies.

Name: Phoenix Feather
Effect Text: Sell: Gain 50 cookies. If you didn't have "Pheonix" revealed, put a "Pheonix" in your discard pile. Remove this item from play.

Name: Farming Sickle
Effect Text:
Action: Gain X cookies. X is equal to your total number of items divided by 2.
Sell: Gain 5 cookies.

Name: Worker's Hammer
Effect Text:
Acquire: Gain 1 favor with Marx.
Activate: Select an item you had revealed with rarity C or R.
Fanfare: Add a copy of the selected item to your discard pile.
Sell: Gain 10 cookies.

Name: Crippling Debt
Effect Text:
Action: All other players lose 0-50 cookies.
Presence: Treat this card as "Blackmail".
Sell: Gain 30 cookies.

Name: The Blog of a Very Angry Housewife
Effect Text:
Action: All other players lose 0-2 favor with each bot.
Presence: Treat this card as a "Scandal Tabloid".
Sell: Gain 30 cookies.

Name: Luxury Taxes
Effect Text:
Activate: Select a player.
Fanfare: The selected player loses X cookies. Add X tax counters to this card. X is equal to 20% of the selected player's cookies rounded up.
Sell: Gain Y cookies. Y is equal to the number of tax counters on this card.

Name: The Communist Manifesto
Effect Text:
Action: Gain 2 favor with Marx.
Presence: Halve all "Gain X Cookies" effects.
Sell: Gain 3 favor with each bot

Name: Mass Media
Effect Text:
Fanfare: Put X "Scandal Tabloid" and X "Blackmail" into the house. X equals 20% of the number of items in the house rounded up.
Action: Gain 10*Y cookies. If Y is greater than 4, win the game. Y equals the number of revealed "Scandal Tabloid" and "Blackmail".
Sell: Gain 6 favor with each bot.

Name: Battle of Wits
Effect Text:
Fanfare: If the total number of items you own is greater than 50, win the game.
Sell: Gain 100 cookies.

Name: Cookie Machine
Effect Text: Action: Gain X cookies. If X equals 15, gain 25 cookies. X is selected from 5-15.

Name: Sketchy Spellbook
Effect Text:
Acquire: Gain 1 favor with TestBot.
Fanfare: If X is 0, Gain 10 cookies. If X is 1, Steal 5 cookies from each player. If X is 2, Gain 1 favor with each bot. If X is 3, Each other player loses 1 favor with each bot. If X is 4, Put a "Sketchy Spellbook" in your discard pile. If X is 5, remove this item from play. X is selected from 0-5.
Action: Discard this item.
Sell: Gain 10 cookies.

Name: Crystal Ball
Effect Text:
Activate: Lose 5 cookies. Select a card in your deck. Discard this card and add the selected card to your hand.
Sell: Gain 30 cookies.

Name: Dowsing Machine
Effect Text:
Activate: Lose 5 cookies. Select a card in your discard pile except "Dowsing Machine". Discard this card and add the selected card to your hand.
Sell: Gain 30 cookies.

Name: Unstable Element
Effect Text:
Fanfare: Place a random item from the house into your discard pile.
Action: Discard this card.
Sell: Gain 50 cookies.

Name: Grim Grimoire
Effect Text:
Acquire: Gain 2 favor with TestBot.
Fanfare: If X is 0, Gain 40 cookies. If X is 1, Steal 10 cookies from each player. If X is 2, Gain 2 favor with each bot. If X is 3, Each other player loses 2 favor with each bot. If X is 4, Put a "Grim Grimoire" in your discard pile. If X is 5, remove this item from play. X is selected from 0-5.
Action: Discard this item.
Sell: Gain 50 cookies.

Name: Teleporter
Effect Text:
Activate: Select a player and an item they revealed.
Fanfare: Swap this card with the selected card. Discard this card and the selected card.
Sell: Gain 50 cookies.
Fanfare: The selected item is sent to the discard pile.
Action: The selected player loses 0-10 cookies.

Name: Time Machine
Effect Text:
Activate: Place a "Paradox" in your discard pile. Remove this card from play. End the Main Phase immediately.
Sell: Gain 100 cookies.

Name: Paradox
Effect Text:
Fanfare: Gain 0-3 favor with TestBot. All other players lose 1-3 favor for each bot, and 10-100 cookies. If you have at least 42 faor with TestBot, win the game.
Sell: Gain 50 cokies and 3-6 favor with TestBot. Put a "Time Machine" in your discard pile. Remove this card from play.

Name: Good Ethics
Effect Text:
Acquire: Gain 2 favor with Nabla. Lose 2 favor with Del.
Action: Bank 10 cookies.

Name: Ornate Vase
Effect Text:
Acquire: Lose 10 cookies. Gain 1 favor with each bot.
Sell: Gain 20 cookies.

Name: Due Diligence
Effect Text:
Acquire: Gain 2 favor with Nabla.
Activate: Select a card in your deck. Discard this card and add that card to your hand.

Name: Formal Ball
Effect Text:
Acquire: Lose 20 cookies. Gain 1 favor with each bot.
Action: Gain 1 favor with each bot.
Sell: Gain 30 cookies.

Name: Manners
Effect Text:
Acquire: Gain 2 favor with Nabla.
Fanfare: Gain 3 favor with all bots.
Action: Discard this card.

Name: Pollock
Effect Text:
Acquire: Lose 40 cookies. Gain 1 favor with each bot.
Sell: Gain 90 cookies.

Name: Discipline
Effect Text:
Acquire: Gain 3 favor with Nabla.
Action: If you have less than 100 cookies, bank 50 cookies and gain 1 favor with all bots. Otherwise, lose 50 cookies.

Name: Mansion
Effect Text:
Acquire: Lose 100 cookies. Gain 2 favor with each bot.
Action: Gain 4 favor with all bots.
Sell: Gain 100 cookies.
